ISSUE.TITLE: Feature request: i18n support
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: It seems like there are some stubs: Language selection in theme settings, en.json in gui/static/lang, but all in all it seems like all texts are hardcoded. I would love to help translate to German.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Docs : Adding how to run locally & contributing sections.
